title: Satellite operators join forces to chase direct-to-smartphone opportunity
summary: A group of satellite operators have joined forces to push the fledgling direct-to-smartphone market to adopt services using their radiowaves, rather than spectrum derived from terrestrial mobile network operators.

title: Beijing government releases commercial space action plan
summary: Beijing’s municipal government has released a set of policies to foster an innovative commercial space ecosystem in the city over the next five years.

title: Rocket Report: US military still wants point-to-point; India’s big 2024 ambitions
summary: "We’re still targeting to get Neutron on the pad before the end of the year."

title: ATMOS Raises €1.3M More to Fund Development of Return Capsule
summary:
German NewSpace startup ATMOS Space Cargo has announced a €1.3-million extension of its seed funding round. The company first closed the round in June 2023, raising €4 million. ATMOS is currently developing its Phoenix return capsule. The capsule would be launched into orbit, where it would be capable of acting as a free flyer offering […]
The post ATMOS Raises €1.3M More to Fund Development of Return Capsule appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: L3Harris demonstrates digital phased array antenna system
summary: During the demonstration in Fairbanks, Alaska, the antenna system prototype handled an average of more than 300 satellite contacts per day, including up to eight simultaneous contacts.
